sense.def:
To use a particular thing
pomeni s stvarjo nekaj narediti zato, da bi opravili določeno delo ali nekaj dosegli.

seg.quote: Use pins to keep it in place.
He wants to use the phone.

sense.def:
To use a particular word or expression
pomeni izreči ali napisati določeno besedo ali izraz.

seg.quote: It's a phrase I once heard him use in a sermon.

sense.def:
To use people
pomeni doseči, da ljudje delajo za nas, ne da bi nas ob tem zanimalo, kako se godi z njimi.

seg.quote: For the first time he felt used.

sense.def:
The use of something
je uporabljanje nečesa.

seg.quote: ...the large-scale use of fertilisers and insecticides.

sense.def:
To have the use of something
pomeni biti sposoben nekaj uporabljati ali imeti dovoljenje za uporabo tiste stvari.

seg.quote: He lost the use of his legs.
I've got the use of the car this evening.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
has a use
ali kadar nekdo
has a use for something
, je tisto mogoče uporabiti za določen namen.

seg.quote: He might later have a use for it.
Possibly I could find some use for these drawers.

sense.def:
A use of a word
je način, kako uporabimo neko besedo, da ima določen pomen.

seg.quote: He brooded on her use of the word ‘important’.

sense.def:
To make use of something
pomeni, da z nečim nekaj naredimo, zato da opravimo določeno delo ali nekaj dosežemo.

seg.quote: Industry is making increasing use of robots.

sense.def:
Naprava, stroj ali postopek je
in use
, kadar ga ljudje redno uporabljajo. Kadar pa je
out of use
, se ne uporablja več redno.

seg.quote: Within the next decade industrial robots will be in widespread use.

sense.def:
Kar je
of use
, je uporabno. Kar je
no use
, pa ni uporabno.

seg.quote: I don't know whether any of these things will be any use to you.

sense.def:
It's no use doing something
ali
what's the use of doing something
rečemo, kadar mislimo, da je dejanje nesmiselno in da z njim ne bomo dosegli ničesar.

seg.quote: It is no use arguing with you.

sense.def:
To use up a supply of something
pomeni, da zaloge nečesa rabimo toliko časa, da tistega ne ostane nič več.

seg.quote: He used up all the coins he had.
